dia.str: Good. The rebel scum would never let go of such an amount. That proves that I can trust you. You are free to look around. If you speak of this place we will find out. You look like a smart kid, so you can imagine what would happen to you.

And by the way. I usually ask for five hundread thalers. So don't think you are 'that' smart. And if you meet good looking young ladies, feel free to tell them about this place. I might have a job or two for them. Like serving food and singing at one of our parties.
